text: N’iyo babwiwe bati “Nimwemere ibyo Allah yahishuye (ubutumwa bwa Muhamadi)”, baravuga bati “Twemera ibyo twahishuriwe” (binyuze ku Ntumwa zacu); bagahakana ibyahishuwe nyuma (Qur’an) kandi ari ukuri gushimangira ibyo bafite (Tawurati). Babwire (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Niba koko mwari abemera by’ukuri, kuki mbere mwicaga abahanuzi ba Allah?”
